response.overview: Lee Chang-Min, a fifth grade primary school boy, moves to Seoul from Andong city, North Kyungsang Province. He makes friends with Yong-Nam, who is the boss of the kids and will emigrate to USA, Young-Cheol who has a distorted nature owing to his disabled body, and Eoksun who is a chatterbox. Chang-Min can comfort and encourage his friends so that every kids in the village likes him to let Yongnam be left alone. The kids grow their dreams, clean the village, collect the waste goods, and practice playing soccer and Taekwondo. One day when Yongnam soon leaves for USA for emigration, a soccer game competition is held to commemorate the farewell of Yongnam, in which all of the residents in the village join to promise brighter future.
response.title: Captain of the Alley
